description:
A chocobo is an adventurer's best friend!

With the new Buddy System, you can take a chocobo buddy with you on your adventure. 
Invite Black Mage and begin your journey now!

[Ability]
Quake：Cast a powerful spell that deals Earth damage to all foes within a 3-tile radius and stuns them.
name: Buddy Chocobo “Black Mage”
